reviews.review_text: I honestly usually avoid pricey headsets and ussually get more affordable options but I was recommended by a local walmart associcate get a more expensive option than usual. I had asked as i was having issues with headsets constantly going out. i usual experience problems quickly with areas: the mic, the sound (going out), and the headset coming failing. I was explained that this is mostly likely due to the lower priced items not being meant for repeated long play sessions. So far it doing well. it also have great spacial sound quality and pickup sound well. i very much like that you can adjust your mic volume individually from the overall sound volume. It is also very comfortable. i usuall think headset make my ears sore but not this one. its adjustable and the over ear area swivels so it feels like it conform to my head comfortably for use.

reviews.title: Great Sound, Super Easy Bluetooth Switching
reviews.review_text: This Corsair gaming headset has quickly become my go-to for both gaming and everyday use. The audio quality is seriously impressive ‚Äì rich, immersive sound with strong bass and crisp detail that makes games and music sound awesome. One of my favorite features is how easy it is to switch between Bluetooth devices. Whether I'm jumping from my PS5 to my phone or even my iPad, the transition is smooth and hassle-free. It's super convenient and makes the headset feel really versatile. The comfort level is also great ‚Äì lightweight with cushy ear cups that hold up well during long sessions. The only small downside is the mic. It works, but sometimes it doesn't pick up my voice very clearly unless I adjust the boom or speak a little louder. Not a huge issue, but something to be aware of if clear voice chat is a priority. All in all, it's an awesome headset with great sound, comfort, and versatility. Just a slight mark off for the mic, but still highly recommended!

reviews.title: Would've returned it, but I was in need
reviews.review_text: Corsair is known for quality electronics, I can't complain about the sound,as it is good on these headphones. What I don't like, and is a problem on every use, is that I have no idea if the microphone is on or not unless I test it with Windows audio recorder or ask my colleagues, "can you hear me?" There is a button to turn it on or off, or it shuts off when the microphone is in the lift position; but there is no indicator of when it is on or off. They put colored lights to indicate whether the headphones were reading from Bluetooth or from the USB dongle, can they put one on to say if the microphone is on or not? Very annoying!

reviews.title: Dang its Fragile
reviews.review_text: Bought May 9th, 2025. 5 months later (October 2, 2025) the extremely flimsy plastic band that goes over the top of your head has broken. A few weeks ago I had to hot glue the ear pads back on. Love being able to go back and forth between PC and blue tooth on my phone, but dang this thing is fragile. Duct tape applied and is kind of holding things together.

reviews.title: Just.. Don't get these. Please.
reviews.review_text: I used these off and on for a few months, and the quality of these is.. abysmal at best. I bought them back in September of '24, and in the nearly one year that I've had them, the ear cups are completely squished to the point they're almost not comfortable, the microphone is either EXTREMELY quiet, to the point nobody can really hear me, or completely broken and breaking people's ears, no in between. Additionally, the head band is cracked in two places, making the headset fit extremely loosely. I most definitely do NOT recommend getting these, as I've had these for far too long, and have had enough.

ibwent and ordered then because they said they were compatible with xbox on the website so i bought them they arived woeked perfectly up untiti needed to actually connect then to the xbox they refused ao i started doing some digging and they are not compatible with xbox whatsoever dont buy worthless product

There microphone will randomly disconnect and stop working. No troubleshooting works to fix the issue. Ended up returning it and getting a replacement and the new one has the same issue. Thinking it's just this headset that is terrible.

reviews.title: BIPOLAR AUDIO
reviews.review_text: The audio is horrendous. The first couple days were fine and now when I go to play, the game audio is aweful if I use the mic, if I don't use the mic the audio is ok, but then I can't communicate. Now it makes a weird ‚Äú Boeing‚Äù noise when I click on things. I have exhausted every option to try and fix this issue and I'm so so so incredibly disappointed in this headset. I used to love this brand. I think I'll shy away for future purchases. Nothing but a headache and frustration. Don't waste your money.

reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT AND HORRIBLE SERVICE BY WALMART
reviews.review_text: Horrible product. Doesn't work with MS Teams and when you try to return them, the only way to do it is to go to the store and return them. Neither do I have a car nor do I have the time do it. Wasted $100 and endless hours talking to walmart support.

This product Is TERRIBLE.It will work good for like a fee weeks then it will start messing it. For me it's been doing things like stuttering and just turning off by itself then when i turn it on it takes like 5 minutes to connect back to my Pc. don't let the cheap price trick you this mic is terrible

reviews.title: It works..

I'm in IT and me and everyone on Reddit can't get the frekin thing to just connect with it's own frekin dongle... Not through our settings, or the bullcrap app that support will tell you to download, or updating this and that and blah blah blah..... Frekin bullcrap.. Edited for censored swear words...

EZ 12 hours. comes with a cord that can be used as a charger or just plug it into the computer and keep listening. ill be honest I haven't really used the mic much but when I have its worked fine and was told it sounded fine, nothing crazy but wasnt bad. Very comfortable. and sounds amazing. I got this on sale so I'm very happy so far.

reviews.title: Disconnects constantlu
reviews.review_text: These are comfortable, relatively lightweight and the mic mute/unmute function is excellent. I really, REALLY wish I could keep these but they consistently disconnect from my work laptop whether I'm connective via bluetooth or the USB stick. I don't know if they go to sleep after a while or inactivity or if the technology is just faulty but I can't have disconnects as a phone agent.

reviews.title: for the money I would buy it again
reviews.review_text: Pretty nice headset. Loud and Crisp sound. Lightweight. The Icue Software doesn't have any options to configure the sound but really don't need it. Mic Quality ain't the best.

reviews.title: Save your money
reviews.review_text: Stopped working after one day. Powers on and makes the noise when you mute and unmute the microphone, but never get any sound from the computer. No matter how many times I change the settings.
Not my favorite corsair product- and I typically love corsair- bulky - hard to connect- thought I was getting a 'great deal' but ... it was actually just a great disappointment

reviews.title: Just get Astro A10s.
reviews.review_text: power button virtually does not function; it's unresponsive for the first time ten times I try to turn it on, and then when it finally does you almost don't want to play anything anymore. of course, it turns *off* with no issue at all. what's worse is they're honestly not that comfortable after a single hour. wish there was a wired option too, as bluetooth for my PC has atrociously bad sound delay. the USB receiver has little to no delay on my Playstation, however. I just picked up a logitech headset and it is significantly better than this one in every regard. This goes for $100 and I got it on sale for $80, but frankly it has the build quality of a $20 headset.

reviews.title: Great sound quality
reviews.review_text: Got these for my boyfriend, and at first he was unsure of how he felt about them.. HOWEVER, the following day, after changing his settings to his personal preferences, he said he absolutely loved them. He had me sit and watch him play and was so excited to show me how much it increased his ability to hear certain aspects of his game! Such a great thing too because he's super particular and doesn't typically like new things or upgrades.. so I was very happy when he said they were great!

Corsair is a name you can trust! Bought these on a whim and have been using them daily ever since. If I could take these to work I would. Mic is nice and snappy, sound quality is good and it comes with an extra long charging cord. If you're in the market for a GOOD pair of headphones for gaming these are a good contender. Also their keyboards are awesome get one of them as well.

reviews.title: Corsair headset
reviews.review_text: This headset is great for gaming, the sound quality is great. The only thing that I had to do was figure out how to turn up the mic volume because other people were telling me it was low. But you can easily fix that by looking it up. Overall great headset üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

reviews.title: I dont feel its worth it
reviews.review_text: So i bought this as my headset was having issues and the HS55 has been far from the best headset ive owned since i got it. To start with the headset is fairly uncomfortable to wear, my next issue is the headset is prone to adjusting my input volume for some reason which an issue ive never had with another headset. It lowers the overall volume at which people hear me to such a low point that they cant hear me until i go back into the setting and fix it. Another issue is that on occasion the headset will ‚Äújam comms‚Äù as my buddy calls it, in which it apparently messes with the audio increasing my volume exponentially and will completely and utterly garble any word that comes out of my mouth until i reset the headset and replug in the dongle. When i attempted to use bluetooth the audio was atrocious and sounded worse than an xbox 360 headset from over a decade ago. Audio is fine when using the dongle besides the previously stated issues. As well, on the application for it on my pc it doesnt allow me to adjust it in any way shape or form. I cannot recommend this product without lying.

reviews.title: functional with exceptional battery life
reviews.review_text: I'm happy with both audio and microphone - I'm no audiophile, but both features work well and I don't notice static or metallic tones or the like. I purchased this for two features - the flip to mute function and the long battery life - and both features have worked as advertised, both allowing me to see when I'm muted and keeping me online through 12-hour emergency meetings without running out of charge. About the only negative is the "user interface", which is a volume dial and three unlabeled buttons. This is a little frustrating at first, since the instructions (for mine, at least) are online and not included in the box, but once the button purposes are known, it's simply enough to use.

reviews.title: Great quality and comfortable!
reviews.review_text: Had to recently replace my old headset and picked this up as it seemed like the only decent pair I could purchase instore at a decent price. I do love mostly everything about them. The sound quality is great and they really do block out any distraction. my only gripes about the headset is about the microphone. The rigidity of the microphone as well as its length and placement are very awkward for me. I have to feel around each time I want to put it back down and because its so short, there are times when in the midst of gaming that I realize I can't tell if the microphone is down or in the up-mute position. a minor gripe, though. i love that the headset lets you know with an audible beep that it has muted itself. It also lacks an annoying constant beep that me old headset had that would happen when it was low on battery. There doesn't appear to be much indication of low battery (not as of yet), but if there is, its at least not aggravating.

reviews.title: Sound great, but......
reviews.review_text: These things worked pretty well for a while, but I have noticed some shortcomings. First, Corsair all but insists that you use the iCue with your hardware. Problem is, it does absolutely NOTHING for this hardware. Like.. Zero. Nothing. At all. Second, for $100 I kinda expect my headset to stay in one piece for longer than 6 months. Not the case here. (*NOTE* I am particularly careful with electronics, and have taken good care of this headset...) First problem was one of the earpads just kinda fell off. Didn't pop off or give any indication of an issue, just fell off while I was pulling them off of my head. So, I bought new ones. Not a huge deal, but I'd rather not have to have spent that $20. Next, a month or so later, one of the little covers just above the ear piece (kinda triangular, it covers wires and such) also just... fell off. While the headset was being worn, just sitting listening to a video. *plonk* - Right on top of my head, then down onto my shirt and off to the floor. This is all just very poor craftmanship. But hey, after supergluing the little cover back on, it hasn't fallen off again, so there's that, I guess...

reviews.title: Good headset
reviews.review_text: bought this for my son to use whike gaming and so far, so good.
The product is good it just wasn't compatible with my current machine

reviews.title: Great headphones
reviews.review_text: Works very well. Sound is great. Fits perfectly. Bluetooth and usb work great.

Great Product bought this some months ago, absolutely love the bluetooth function and the long battery life . i recorded it and it took 3 and a half days for the battery to run low -o- overall 10000/10 recommend to everyone

reviews.title: poor audio quality
reviews.review_text: it may be a decent and comfortable headset but the poor audio quality is inexcusable, i have a pair of $20 dollar ONN brand earbuds that have more consistent audio feedback and a crisper and more dynamic sound range, please save your money

reviews.title: Broke
reviews.review_text: I bought the headset in April and one of the ear pieces fell off. It looks like you can attach the ear piece again, not it will not stay latches on. For the price I would think the pieces would be sturdier!

reviews.title: Can't hear
reviews.review_text: so I bought this twice. 1st time when i talked into it, i couldn't be heard at all. 2nd time would not even connect no matter what tried, so it was useless, and the package I bought had no charging cord with it, which i could deal with, but not working is different. Will not try a 3rd time.. Terrible product

reviews.title: Best headset ever
reviews.review_text: I needed to replace my wired hs55, and happened to catch this one on sale for a good price. I love corsair, it's an extremely comfortable and good quality product i use for gaming or just listening to music. I had mine for about half a year, and they don't wear and tear easily if you take good care of em.

reviews.title: Buy them!!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this headset! Pairing and configuring them was super easy, the audio is amazing and I love how it cancels out my background noises. If you're in the market for a new headset, I highly recommend these!

reviews.title: sound
reviews.review_text: i read a lot of reviews saying that the sound quality is bad but for me they sound really good and especially compared to my previous headset (it was like a $50 steelseries wired one)

reviews.title: Not too shabby.
reviews.review_text: Not a bad set of headphones. Clean, crisp, little too light on the bass for my liking but all around not bad

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review_text: I like how the fit. I like the noise canceling and clear sound. Only drawback is that they are too heavy.

reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
reviews.review_text: I liked the sound quality and color of it though it would have been better looking black instead of grey

reviews.title: good headset
reviews.review_text: Love these headphones. Great deal. work super for my gaming pc. My go to.
